name: fast-otp
description: An OTP (one-time password) package is a software or hardware solution that provides tools and infrastructure for implementing OTP-based authentication. OTPs are unique, time-limited codes that are used to protect online accounts and sensitive information. OTP packages typically include a server component for generating and verifying OTPs, as well as a client component for sending and receiving the codes. These packages help organizations and individuals securely protect their online assets and sensitive information.
author: Sourav Ganguli <mysganguli@gmail.com>
